Primary Contact: Director, Owaissi Anglican Camp Association; Phone: 778.478.8312; Email: oac.director@gmail.com
Service Details: - Offers summer camps for children and youth ages 7-17 years - Includes special themes each week, chapel, swimming, canoeing, kayaking, sports, hiking, crafts, drama, music and campfires - Provides facility rental for retreats, weddings, and family reunions during non-summer camp periods  - Also available for school groups, family reunions and group rentals at other times of the year
How to Apply: - To register your child online for Summer Camp, please visit our website, and click on the Registration tab - For Group Rental Bookings, email the Executive Director or download the agreement from the Printable Forms tab on the website
Address & Map: Owaissi Anglican Camp2411 Westside PlWest Kelowna, BC     V1Z 3T5View MapQuest Map
